title: Mother charged after 4-year-old shoots self with gun in Norfolk home
content:
The mother of a four-year-old child who shot with a gun found in a Norfolk home faces charges, police said.
Monique McNeal, 25, is charged with two counts of felony child neglect for a July 8 shooting at her Holt Street home, off Mariner Street in Norfolk, according to police reports,
A 4-year-old boy found a gun in the home and shot himself. The bullet grazed the boy, but he wasn't seriously injured, police said.
The boy was taken to a local hospital, and is doing well, police said Friday.
Another child, a three-year-old boy, was also in the home when the shooting occurred, police said.
